GSP30paratriu:3: etad guhyaṃ mahāguhyaṃ kathayasva mama prabho |
GSP30paratriu:4: hṛdayasthā tu yā śaktiḥ kaulinī kulanāyikā || 2 ||
GSP30paratriu:5: tām me kathaya deveśa yena tṛptiṃ vrajāmy aham |
GSP30paratriu:9: kauliko 'yaṃ vidhir devi mama hṛdvyomny avasthitaḥ || 4 ||
GSP30paratriu:16: amūlā tatkramā jñeyā kṣāntā sṛṣṭir udāhṛtā |
GSP30paratriu:17: sarveṣāṃ caiva mantrāṇāṃ vidyānāṃ ca yaśasvini || 8 ||
GSP30paratriu:21: etan nā yoginījāto nā rudro labhate sphuṭam |
GSP30paratriu:25: muhūrtaṃ smarate yas tu cumbake nābhimudritaḥ |
GSP30paratriu:26: sa badhnāti tadā dehaṃ mantramudrāgaṇaṃ naraḥ || 12 ||
GSP30paratriu:34: yacchanti paramāṃ siddhiṃ phalaṃ yad vā samīhitam || 16 ||
GSP30paratriu:35: anena siddhāḥ setsyanti sādhayanti ca mantriṇaḥ || 17 ||
GSP30paratriu:36: yatkiṃcid bhairave tantre sarvam asmāt prasidhyati |
GSP30paratriu:38: adṛṣṭama.ṅdalo 'py evam yaḥ kaścid vetti tattvataḥ |
GSP30paratriu:39: sa siddhibhāg bhaven nityaṃ sa yogī sa ca dīkṣītaḥ || 19 ||
GSP30paratriu:46: aṇur viśuddham acirād aisvaraṃ jñānam aśnute |
GSP30paratriu:48: sarvago nirmalaḥ svacchas tṛptaḥ svāyatanaḥ śuciḥ |
GSP30paratriu:51: evaṃ yo vetti tattvena tasya nirvāṇagāminī || 25 ||
GSP30paratriu:53: mūrdhni vaktre ca hṛdaye guhye murtau tathaiva ca || 26 ||
GSP30paratriu:55: ekaikena diśāṃ bandhaṃ daśānām api kārayet || 27 ||
GSP30paratriu:58: puṣpādikaṃ kramāt sarvaṃ liṅgaṃ vā stha.ṅdilaṃ ca vā |
GSP30paratriu:60: tatra sṛṣṭiṃ yajed vīraḥ punar evāsanaṃ tataḥ |
GSP30paratriu:61: sṛṣṭiṃ tu sampuṭīkṛtya paścād yajanam ārabhet || 30 ||
GSP30paratriu:65: pūjayet parayā bhaktyā svātmanaṃ ca nivedayet || 32 ||
GSP30paratriu:66: evaṃ yajanam ākhyātam agnikārye 'py ayaṃ vidhiḥ |
GSP30paratriu:70: yān yān kāmayate kāmāṃs tān tāñ cchīghram avāpnuyāt |
GSP30paratriu:71: ajñaḥ pratyakṣatām eti sarvajñatvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ || 35 ||
